page.title: 18AT SCHOOL IN S.E.LUTON(1)
page.content:
A comparison of Dallow Junior School with the old Dunstable Rd.School which it replaced.
{BUILDINGS.}Dunstable Rd.was opened in 1887.It had a bell tower and skylights in the roof.The classrooms opened off the Hall.The 2 small playgrounds each had a toilet in a shed.Dallow opened in 1981 with 1 playground and a large sports-field. The classrooms are off a long corridor with a hall to one side. {CLASS-SIZE.}1935=50..1985=30. {NUMBER OF CHILDREN.}1932=600..1985=300 {ORIGIN OF CHILDREN.}This has changed from mainly English.In 1985, 93% of pupils belonged to families which originated in Asia,mainly Pakistan or Bangladesh.
